text: taruvāya nāvu vīryavannu raktada piṇḍavāgisidevu mattu ā raktada piṇḍavannu mānsapiṇḍavāgisidevu mattu ā mānsapiṇḍadinda elubugaḷannu sr̥ṣṭisidevu mattu elubugaḷige mānsada uḍugeyannu toḍisidevu. Anantara nāvu ātanannu ondu hosa rūpadalli huṭṭisidevu. Allāhanu samr̥d'dhanu mattu avanu atyuttama sr̥ṣṭikartanu
